mapper.select: select RNO ,fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule from ( select rownum AS RNO ,fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule from ( select fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, A.imagearr, seq_schedule from tbl_schedule A left join tbl_schedule_detail B on A.seq_schedule = B.fk_seq_schedule group by A.fk_userid, a.registerday,a.startday,A.title, A.imagearr, A.seq_schedule order by registerday desc )V )T where RNO >= #{startRno} and RNO <= #{endRno}

select RNO ,fk_userid, to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd ') as registerday, to_char(startday, 'yyyy-mm-dd ') as startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule,nvl(alldays,0) as alldays from ( select rownum AS RNO ,fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule,alldays from ( select fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule, sum(days) as alldays from tbl_schedule A left join tbl_schedule_detail B on A.seq_schedule = B.fk_seq_schedule group by A.fk_userid, a.registerday,a.startday,A.title, A.imagearr, A.seq_schedule order by registerday desc )V )T
where RNO >= #{startRno} and RNO <= #{endRno}
select count(*) from tbl_schedule order by seq_schedule desc
select count(*) from tbl_schedule where fk_userid = #{fk_uesrid} and ${colname} like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' order by seq_schedule desc

select RNO ,fk_userid, to_char(registerday, 'yyyy-mm-dd ') as registerday, to_char(startday, 'yyyy-mm-dd ') as startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule,nvl(alldays,0) as alldays from ( select rownum AS RNO ,fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule,alldays from ( select fk_userid, registerday, startday, title, imagearr, seq_schedule, sum(days) as alldays from tbl_schedule A left join tbl_schedule_detail B on A.seq_schedule = B.fk_seq_schedule group by A.fk_userid, a.registerday,a.startday,A.title, A.imagearr, A.seq_schedule order by registerday desc )V )T where RNO between 1 and 3
select fk_category from ( select rownum as rno, seq_schedule_detail, fk_seq_schedule, fk_category, days from tbl_schedule_detail where fk_seq_schedule = #{seq_schedule} order by 1 ) where rno = 1
